columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the rule group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entity.

columns.name: rule_group_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the rule group.

columns.name: metric_name
columns.description: A friendly name or description for the metrics for this RuleGroup.

columns.name: activated_rules
columns.description: A list of activated rules associated with the resource.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the resource.
